alert.note: Alert for Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Quitman County through 830 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Osco, or near Eufaula, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Hatcher, Wire Bridge, Crossroads and Bonapartes Retreat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
